status.description: Report the current status of the autonomous agent including the number of goals and running state.

purge.description: Remove any persisted fast cache entries so that new answers are recomputed.

input.description: Ingest an external file into the system.  This command is a placeholder and is not yet implemented.

whoami.description: Generate a comprehensive self-introduction based on real introspection. Scans codebase, reads memory stats, checks active capabilities.

detail_level.description: Level of detail: brief (one sentence), standard (4 sentences), full (complete introduction)

introduce.description: Alias for whoami - generates dynamic self-introduction.

self.description: Scan Maven's own system structure and status.

memory.description: Check memory tier health across all brains.

execution.description: Enable full execution mode with user confirmation.

tools.description: List all available tools and their capabilities.
